result.execSummary:
The defendant Desmond L. Love was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Desmond L. Love is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Desmond L. Love was found guilty of Manufacture/Deliver Cocaine (<=1g) [Modifiers: Conspiracy to Commit], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(cm)1g.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
2:40 p.m. Defendant Desmond L. Love in custody in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin  along with DA intern, Eric Klemm, under the student practice rule. PSI filed March, 2016. Schiek/Chernin/Defendant/Court statement on sentencing. 
Court Sentence
WHS/POP - 5 years
CC/DNA Surcharge/Supervision Fees - 
DNA Sample
  The court informs defendant of right to request expungement of the DNA under Wis. Stat. 165.77(4).
Obtain HSED or equivalency.
Obtain/maintain full time employment/education
Jail - 1 year with Huber for all purposes. May serve in Milwaukee or Oneida County, as approved by Sheriff's Department.
Jail credit - 84 days if revoked
AODA assessment and follow through
Random drug/alcohol testing
Cash bond to be applied to costs and balance to be refunded to poster.
Any other conditions/counseling deemed appropriate by PO.
Appeal rights given. 
Adj. 3:17 p.m.
Sentencing hearing on June 3, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

1:38 p.m. Attorney Michael L. Chernin in court appearing telephonically with leave of court; Defendant appearing telephonically via conference call with Attorney Chernin.  Michael William Schiek appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Chernin statement off record that defendant was taken into custody in court in Milwaukee County yesterday - mother paid bail - defendant was just released from Milwaukee County Jail 1/2 hour ago and is at his home - Court statement to PSI report - Defendant is not cooperating with PSI evaluation - Schiek statement - moves for warrant to be issued or additional bond to be set - Court - defendant is not entitled to bond at this point in proceeding per statute - Chernin - statement that Milwaukee County was going to rely on PSI from Oneida County for sentencing in that case; Defendant is still in high school; Chernin moves that defendant be directed to complete PSI to be done out of custody and to set a date to check status of PSI coooperation. Court orders that Defendant turn himself in to Oneida County Sheriff's Department until sentencing hearing is held. Defendant to report to ONSO on or before 4:00 p.m. on March 19, 2016 if defendant does not appear - warrant to issue and Defendant may be facing additional bail jumping charges. Adj. 1:53 p.m.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for April 22, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

2:53 p.m. Defendant Desmond L. Love in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Steven Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf129 and 15cf133. State moves to dismiss Counts 2 and 3 in 15cf129 and Count 1 in 15cf133 - Granted. Plea questionnaire filed. Defendant enters guilty plea.   Court reads on waiver of rights and tendering plea. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that a factual basis for the plea exists and finds defendant guilty. Court orders PSI to be completed. Bail continued. Adj. 3:01 p.m. 
  Sentencing hearing scheduled for March 18, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

2:36 p.m. Defendant Desmond L. Love in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15cf129 and 15cf133. Chernin statement - negotiations ongoing - offer was made yesterday - only discussed briefly with client - requests plea hearing. Bail continued. 2:37 p.m.  Plea hearing scheduled for January 4, 2016 at 01:30 pm.
States Reply to Discovery  and State's Demand for Discovery

3:33 p.m. Defendant Desmond L. Love in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin appeared telephonically with leave of court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Calling 15CF133. Chernin states has not received information filed in 15cf129. Michlig provides defendant with copies of Information in both cases. Waives reading of Information - pleads not guilty 1, 2 15cf129; count 3 not guilty - as to count 1 15cf133 - not guilty.  Court enters not guilty pleas. Bail continued. Adj. 3:37 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 29, 2015 at 02:00 pm.
of prelim- defendant misplaced originals - will take fax as originals

Defendant Desmond L. Love in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin who appears telephonically with leave of Court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
2:34
Calling 15cf129 and 15cf133
  Defendant waives preliminary hearings in both cases. Atty  faxed in written waivers of prelims - Waivers free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over.
Bail continued
  Arraignment scheduled for August 3, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

02:40 pm - Defendant Desmond L. Love in court with attorney Michael L. Chernin, appearing telephonically with leave of the court.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Calling 15cf133 and 15cf129.    In receipt of complaint, waive reading - set for preliminary hearing - Time limits waived
Bail continued  Preliminary hearing scheduled for July 15, 2015 at 02:30 pm.

Defendant Desmond L. Love in court, via video in custody.  Steven Mitchell Michlig appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
1:52
In receipt, right to counsel - 
Michlig to bail - Court sets $   bond  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 8, 2015 at 02:30 pm.
